page.title: 12O.A.P's VIEWS OF CLIFTON
page.content: These are the old people's views on Clifton from a survey we did of 20 O.A.P's. Most old people like the{shops}in {Clifton}because there is a good variety of everything.The{Supermarkets are cheap but many O.A.P's find the prices in the smaller shops expensive.Some of the old people found difficulty in getting to the shops because they are too far away. Nearly all the old people did not like the way the{houses}are laid out on the estate,though one said it was "better than worse".They said there are too many houses and the roads are confusing.Many felt they didn't like the design of the houses but this did not apply to the old people in sheltered homes. The old people felt young{children} are nice with little vandalism.
